misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a golfer hailing from Hirsala Golf, brings a unique blend of skill and sophistication to the greens. Known for his discerning taste as a wine connoisseur, Jaakko appreciates the finer things in life, both on and off the course.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jaakko is a familiar face at the event. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jaakko's dedication and passion for the game remain unwavering. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his fourth appearance in the event.

A word of caution to his playing partners: ensure that tee times are clearly communicated, as Jaakko may occasionally find himself running fashionably late. Nevertheless, his camaraderie and sportsmanship make him a valued participant in the competition.
